section.title: Overview
section.para: This module provides on-server speed dial facilities. An user can store records consisting of pairs short numbers (2 digits) and SIP addresses into a table of OpenSIPS. Then it can dial the two digits whenever it wants to call the SIP address associated with them.

section.title: &osips; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
database module (mysql, dbtext, ...).

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &osips; with this module loaded:
None.

section.title: db_url (string)
section.para: The URL of database where the table containing speed dial records.

section.title: user_column (string)
section.para: The name of column storing the user name of the owner of the speed dial record.

section.title: domain_column (string)
section.para: The name of column storing the domain of the owner of the speed dial record.

section.title: sd_user_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column storing the user part of the short dial address.

section.title: sd_domain_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column storing the domain of the short dial address.

section.title: new_uri_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing the URI that will be use to replace the short dial URI.

section.title: domain_prefix (string)
section.para: If the domain of the owner (From URI) starts with the value of this parameter, then it is stripped before performing the lookup of the short number.

section.title: use_domain (int)
section.para: The parameter specifies wheter or not to use the domain when searching a speed dial record (0 - no domain, 1 - use domain from From URI, 2 - use both domains, from From URI and from request URI).
The function lookups the short dial number from R-URI in 'table' and replaces the R-URI with associated address.
Meaning of the parameters is as follows:

listitem.para: table (string) - The name of the table storing the speed dial records.
owner (string) - The SIP URI of the owner of short dialing codes. If not pressent, URI of From header is used.

section.para: This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE.
